# Portugal Immigration App - Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
Next.js TypeScript web application for Portugal immigration document management.

## Setup Steps
- [x] Create workspace instructions file
- [ ] Clarify project requirements
- [ ] Scaffold the project
- [ ] Customize the project
- [ ] Install required extensions
- [ ] Compile the project
- [ ] Create and run task
- [ ] Launch the project
- [ ] Ensure documentation is complete

## Execution Guidelines
- Use '.' as working directory
- Keep communication concise
- Follow Next.js best practices
- Track progress through checklist
